name: Jason James
body:
## Jason Charles James

2723 Cedar Drive
Lawrenceville, GA 30043 
770-366-6979

## EDUCATION

Georgia Gwinnett College, Lawrenceville, GA
 	Information Technology with Software Development Concentration
	Expected date of graduation:  December 2014
Overall GPA – 3.49, ITEC GPA – 3.60

Georgia Perimeter College, Dunwoody, GA						
A.S. General Studies, December 2011

## RELEVANT COURSES:
 
* Advanced Programming (Java)
* Advanced Database (Oracle 11g)
* Software Development
* Digital Media
* Principles of Management
* Operating Systems

## SKILLS
 
* Java/Android
* SQL


## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

 
Gwinnett Medical Center, Lawrenceville, GA					 3/2014 – Present
PC Tech Intern
* Lead a team of interns on a large scale IT project
* Coordinated the deployment of computers across several campuses

Synergy Benefits, Atlanta, GA							 9/2010 – 12/2013
Billing & Enrollment Specialist
* Processed online enrollments
* Assisted with the implementation of billing and enrollment systems

Willis, Lawrenceville, GA							 7/2009-9/2010
Account Executive/Market Analyst
* Performed market analysis a large block of business (~$1M)

HR Outsourcing, Lawrenceville, GA						 8/2008-3/2009
Benefits Specialist

HRH, Lawrenceville, GA							            	 7/2007-7/2008
Account Executive/Market Analyst
* Performed market analysis a large block of business (~$1M)

Office Depot Business Solutions Division, Norcross, GA		            	            	3/2006 – 7/2007
Sales Assistant
*Assisted with reporting and administration for 2 sales teams.

## MEMBERSHIPS

* Upsilon Pi Epsilon (IT Honors Society)
* Association of Information Technology Professionals (AITP)
